text: 17.8 Sng 69.28, Dan 7.7, 12.1, Lep 11.7, 13.1-3, 13.8-10 Tap ladek nepan anɨb ak, ned yolɨgup, mɨñɨl ma mɨdeb agak. Pen wulep mɨdeb, ne kaw mɨgan kɨluŋ ma tɨkak ayaŋ kelɨgɨl apek, God gek pɨsnep kul gɨnɨgab agak. Pen God man ma gɨlak ñɨn ak, binɨb lum awl ogɨnap, yɨb kɨlop pel mɨdep mɨj ayaŋ ma kɨl tɨk lak agak. Binɨb anɨb okok, tap ladek tepayaŋ yek nɨŋɨd, gos gos lɨnɨgabal agak. Taynen? Ne ned yolɨgup, mɨñɨl ma mɨdeb ak pen, kɨdek tepayaŋ yenɨgab agak.
